name: 林祐正
objective:
本課程將以工程資訊管理之觀點，介紹國內外工程資訊管理及營建自動化案例，包含資訊管理程式撰寫及探討資料庫之設計與實作，希望學生能夠由設計一個資訊系統開始，瞭解工程資訊管理系統之基本概念與應用，進而實際開發一個資訊管理系統，其內容包括：營建自動化應用，建築資訊模型應用，國內外工程資訊管理案例探討，工程資訊之分析與設計，資訊管理程式撰寫，資料庫系統之設計與實作，及系統分析與設計等方法。
This course will provide students with the application of engineering information management and the practice of construction management system, management information system concept, the introduction of database design, building information management application, web-based project management system development, integrate construction management information system's introduction, the introduction of construction automation application, the future of engineering information management and other special topics.
schedule:
Major topics of this course
1. Introduction to Engineering Information Management (EIM) in AEC
2. Hardware and software for EIM 
3. Database Design for EIM 
4. Information Communication Technology (ICT) for EIM
5. Applications of BIG Data for EIM
6. Applications of Internet of Things (IOT) for EIM
7. Applications of 3D Printing for EIM
8. Applications of AR/VR/MR for EIM
9. Applications of Artificial Intelligence (AI) for EIM
10. Applications of Cloud-based PM System for EIM
11. Applications of Mobile Apps for EIM
12. Applications of Smart Manufacturing for EIM
13.  Applications of BIM/CIM for Engineering Information Management
14. The Special Topic for EIM in AEC
15. Case Studies
scorePolicy:
1. Attendance and class participation (10%)
2. Assignments (50%)
3. Final Report (40%)
